p: A study from Huang et al. demonstrated that myocardial injury, defined by an increase in hs-cTnI levels (> 28 pg/mL), occurred on 5 out of 41 COVID-19 patients. Noteworthy is the fact that 80% of these patients required ICU management demonstrating that myocardial damage in SARS-COV-2 infection is severe [ 2] .
